definition: to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: At last, it obducted and thrusted to outcrop on the surface.
sentences.chinese: 後期又由於仰衝推覆，最終出露地表。

sentences.english: Usually, there are densely distributed small instable rocks in a low-angled stratofabric rock slope.
sentences.chinese: 緩傾角層狀巖質邊坡是小危巖體出露的主要坡型之一。

sentences.english: Miocene formations (better: strata) are well-exposed in this area.
sentences.chinese: 本區具有出露良好的中新世地層。

sentences.english: The Pre-Sinian Darezha Formation is widely exposed in west Mianning.
sentences.chinese: 冕寧西部是康滇地區前震旦系出露較集中的地段之一。

sentences.english: The Xiushui Formation of Mid Proterozoic Shuangqiaoshan Group is widely distributed in North Jiangxi .
sentences.chinese: 贛北地區中元古代雙橋山羣修水組廣泛出露。

sentences.english: Seams in the anorthosite series are only intermittently exposed.
sentences.chinese: 斜長巖組中的礦層僅斷續出露。

sentences.english: It holds also one of the most complete successions of the Cambrian strata known in China.
sentences.chinese: 此地同樣也是我國寒武系地層出露最完整的地區之一。

sentences.english: A giant Late Mesozoic A -type granitoid zone occurred in east China can be divided into five sub-zones of two episodes.
sentences.chinese: 沿中國東部出露一條晚中生代巨型A型花崗岩帶。

sentences.english: Interpretation of anomaly due to a body exposed in the relief surface.
sentences.chinese: 出露於起伏地面的密度體異常的解釋。

sentences.english: The Main Chromitite Seam and the Merensky Reef do not outcrop well.
sentences.chinese: 主鉻鐵巖礦層及麥侖斯基礦層出露不好。

sentences.english: Yanshanian strongly peraluminous intrusive rocks occur sporadically in the Hebei-Shanxi-Liaoning area.
sentences.chinese: 燕山期強過鋁質侵入岩零星出露於冀晉遼地區。

sentences.english: This article introduces the exposed character of subsided column under the well of Taoyuan coal mine, Huaibei Coal Mining Bureau, Anhui Province.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了桃園煤礦井下所見陷落柱的出露特徵。

sentences.english: There are a great number of Odoriferous fountains in Liupanshan Mountain area, south Ningxia.
sentences.chinese: 六盤山地區多處有臭水泉羣出露。

sentences.english: The Liujiaping complex occurs on the northwest margin of the Yangzi paraplatform.
sentences.chinese: 劉家坪雜巖體出露於揚子準地臺西北邊緣。

sentences.english: The carbonate rocks outcropping within China cover an area of more than one eighth of the whole territory.
sentences.chinese: 中國碳酸鹽巖的出露在領土的八分之一以上。

definition: Ordovician system (geology)/see 奧陶紀|奥陶纪
variant of 岩層|岩层[yan2 ceng2]/rock strata
rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
